blog.name: finn-n-poe
blog.title: "Keep it. It suits you."
blog.description:
The Stormpilot sideblog of leroiaragorn.

Feel free to prompt me!

Header | Icon

tags: thank you so much for the prompt and sorry again for the lateness!
summary: Hey you are taking prompts right ?  If you are could you do #27 "Kiss me" with Stormpilot obviously because they are gay for...
question: Hey you are taking prompts right ?  If you are could you do #27 "Kiss me" with Stormpilot obviously because they are gay for each other
answer:
It’s true, they are gay for each other. I am so sorry this is so late! But here it is, and I hope you enjoy it! (Using prompt 27 from this list of angst/fluff prompts.) 

Finn and Poe walked cautiously through the crowded streets, consciously looking for stormtroopers or any other sign of the First Order. Although this planet had not been invaded yet, Resistance intelligence suggested that the city Finn and Poe were in would be attacked sometime in the next few days. The two men were there to scout the area, and to call back to base as soon as they found evidence of the First Order’s presence. 

Although they were boyfriends, both Finn and Poe knew that this mission was too important to get distracted by each other on. As such, they’d instated a temporary pause on their relationship — just until they got the call back to base and didn’t have to always be on high alert. 

Finn had readily agreed to the pause, and he truly thought it was the right move. But it had been three days now; three days since he had kissed Poe, said “I love you” to Poe, or slept with his pilot next to him. It was starting to grow almost unbearable. He looked for First Order signs with a new vigor, hoping to see something that would allow them to finally resume their relationship.

Poe was feeling equally on edge. He and Finn had only been dating for about a month now, but it had been a long time coming. When Poe thought about, he’d probably loved Finn since the first day they’d met, when they’d made that daring escape and Finn had thrown off all ties to the First Order for good. 

Poe had thought he’d known everything there was to know about Finn; they’d been friends for two years now, and had already shared some of their biggest secrets with each other before they’d started dating. But now that they were boyfriends, Poe was discovering all of these new facets of Finn: Finn’s love of animals, his (endearing but annoying) morning-person personality, and the way he likes to be touching Poe at all times, whether he’s holding Poe’s hand during dinner or subtly leaning into Poe during meetings… 

It’d only been three days, and yet Poe was already longing for Finn’s touches again. Finn had always been naturally tactile; now, they weren’t touching at all. The lack of contact had created a kind of hollow feeling in Poe’s chest. He knew this self-imposed break they were on was for the best, but couldn’t wait until this mission was over. 

Poe almost jumped when Finn grabbed him by the shoulders and spun him around. Finn looked at him for a moment, clearly agitated, and then said the last thing Poe had expected to hear.

“Kiss me.” 

“What?” Poe asked, trying to shrug away. Finn, however, wouldn’t let him go. “Finn, I know this is hard for both of us, but we agreed to pause our relationship for a reason —”

“Kiss me, Poe, or the stormtroopers will recognize both of us!”

Poe snuck a quick glance over Finn’s shoulder and saw two stormtroopers approaching, guns in their hands but not (for now) in combat position. He looked back at Finn and grinned.

“Well, if it’s for the mission.”

The stormtroopers walked right past them, not wanting to look too closely at the two men kissing each other as though their lives depended on it (which, one could argue, it did). Finn was holding Poe as closely as he possibly could, and both of them were overwhelmed by the kiss after the last three days of zero contact. They kissed for a few more moments (just to be extra safe, of course) before they finally broke the kiss off.

“Well, that was…” Finn started, feeling a blush start to color his cheeks. They’d certainly never had a kiss like that before. 

“That was definitely worth three days of waiting,” Poe said, flashing that infectious grin of his again. 

They reported the stormtroopers’ presence to base, packed up their things, and flew back home. With the prompt warning, the Resistance was able to defend the plant and prevent the First Order from taking it over. They not only saved hundreds of lives, but also gained a new ally in the process, as the planet ending up joining the Resistance.

As for Finn and Poe, their memories of that mission made them treasure their moments together even more than they had before.

summary: Lando: I'm proud to identify as a moronsexual. Han asked me what the Spanish word for tortilla was once and now I dream of...
body:
Lando: I'm proud to identify as a moronsexual. Han asked me what the Spanish word for tortilla was once and now I dream of kissing him under the moonlight.
Han: What kind of animal is the Pink Panther?
Lando, already taking off his clothes: Han you're so fucking stupid

tags: sorry this was a little late
question: Ohhh Skysolo at a convention!!
answer:
Luke was, in all honesty, one of the biggest nerd Han had ever met. Which was saying something because Han had met his fair share of nerds, and hell, maybe he was a bit of one himself—not that you’d ever catch him somewhere as embarrassing as a comic convention, though.

But for someone like Luke, he was willing to make an exception.

But for someone like Luke, he was willing to make an exception.

tags: i guess i'm just an animation fan
i DO love all the movies tho
title: I realized yesterday
body:
that I genuinely might prefer The Clone Wars (and maybe also Rebels) to the live-action SW movies (even the OT omg omg) 

and I’m having something of an identity crisis

but like I was watching a TCW episode yesterday and grinning/laughing the entire time because it was so funny/entertaining and feels-worthy and I had to take breaks just to process how good it was 

and I feel like I can hardly hold any of my favorite movies to these standards 😂

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: ROGUE TWO: REYLO ONE SHOT
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2lkk1SV

by Fifiwritesfluff

Post TLJ Ben and Rey are connecting through the force in more ways than one.

And yet the force is giving them no answers about how they can ever be together in the real world.

Rey recalls a story of a rebel girl and a captain who fought for hope in the darkest of times, and a man who used his position in the empire to turn the tide for the opposing side.

What can they learn from the lessons of the past to help break out of the deadlock that keeps them apart?

Short one shot based on my head canon that Ben will become a double agent and bring down the FO from within.

Spoiler warnings for Rogue One and the Last Jedi. Mild reference to sex but this (for once) isn’t my usual smut-fest.

Words: 635, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

title: My Heart Will Go On
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KbWilU

by xXCuteMariaClaraXx

Engaged to be married to a man who does not love, a match enforced by her money grubbing guardian, Unkar Plutt. The poised young orphan aristrocrat, Rey, is utterly miserable. On her first night abroad the RMS Titanic, she debates by pitching herself over the edge of the ship and into the icy waters below, giving up hope in all. That is until she meets a certain young man named Ben.

Words: 2434, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M, Multi

summary: Tropes that will never get old:
title: Tropes that will never get old:
body: • The ship upon which everyone’s lives depend is held together by spit, duct tape, and hope.
